oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pickard Family Performance Dec. 7, 9:00 & Dec. 8, 6:45
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 7 of 7. Two recordings of the Pickard Family (performance group) from December 7, of an unknown year, and December 8, of an unknown year, respectively. Sessions are recorded in Mexico.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pickard Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) All Aboard for Tennessee (Pickard Family) [Featuring a voice over] -- (00:51) Ruthie laughs and Obed plus Peruna while thanking the public -- (01:28) Will the Angels Play Their Harps For Me (Pickard Family) [Featuring Charlie vocals] -- (03:38) Obed greets the crowd and Charlie introduces the next song while twisting Bud about payment -- (04:30) When It's Roundup Time in Heaven (Pickard Family) -- (07:12) Obed thanks the family and Bub and Ruthie talk about writing for cowboys -- (07:48) Kolorbak commercial break performed by Bub Pickard -- (09:34) Dill Pickle Rag (Pickard Family) -- (10:26) Ruthie introduces Bub and Charlie's next song -- (11:04) Granddad Song (Pickard Family) [Featuring Charlie vocals] -- (12:31) Obed, Bub and Ruthie joke outro -- (12:53) All Aboard for Tennessee (Pickard Family) [Featuring a voice over] -- (13:22) Obed greets the audience and introduces the first track -- (14:10) Oh Dem Golden Slippers (Pickard Family) [Featuring Obed vocal] -- (16:30) Obed introduces the crowd and Ruthie asks to hear the next track -- (17:25) Blind Boy's Lament (Pickard Family) -- (20:04) Obed challenges Ruthie to a contest and Charlie and Ruthie talk about being blind -- (20:45) Kolorbak commercial break performed by Obed Pickard -- (22:17) Piano Duet (Pickard Family) [Featuring Obed and Mom] -- (23:23) Just an Echo in the Valley (Pickard Family) [Featuring Charlie vocals] -- (24:53) Obed thanks Charlie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pickard Family (Musical group);
